Sentence: Isolation of caecal LPMC and IEC The dissected specimens were washed with Ca + - and Mg + - free PBS, the caecal fold was removed and discarded.
Subgingival plaque samples ( subgingival) were taken from the deepest periodontal pocket ( 4mm) of the sampling teeth.
Segmental evaluation: ascending colon, transverse colon, descending colon and sigmoid colon.
